name: Egypt Versus Zombies
description:
You have to defend Egypt from a hoard of Zombies and save your artifacts that you have been collecting for years.

This Game is still in development. If you restart the game after going to the menu there might be problems loading back in. Just restart the game then it will load fine.

This will be fixed.

In my collection I have dug up a old mummy

It has infected the world making everyone who touches the mummy to turn into a zombie.

Considering they just had a museum exhibit featuring the mummy

a whole mess of people have already turned into zombie's

it is up to us to fix this.

Defend Egypt and save the world.

Defend Egypt and win 20 fun playable levels to save the world.

This demo game only has one level and in in progress.

Three waves in each level so this demo has only three waves so far.

This is a example of how the game will play.
